channel.title: Linux on PR

item.title: Grep - Swiss army knife
item.description: I have used this command sparingly in the past and I recently learnt more options by solving couple of my problems.

item.title: Link: This is Linus
item.description: Last week Zite suggested this article, I’ve known about Linus and his rude comments. But reading this article, I realised that being polite is not right solution for everything.
